      class  Quaternionf
      An immutable single-precision floating point implementation of a quaternion.

      Creates a new quaternion from the specified (w, [x, y, z]) values, where w is the scalar part and [x, y, z] is the vector part.

      Quaternion Quaternionf.normalize() 
      Quaternion Quaternionf.slerp(Quaternion end, float t)
      Performs spherical linear interpolation from this to end by t, which is automatically clamped to the [0, 1] range.
      Quaternion Quaternionf.sub(Quaternion q) 
      Quaternion Matrix4f.toQuaternion() 
      Quaternion Matrix4.toQuaternion()
